title: Antiagon Fire
description: The hard-won battles fought in Imager's Battalion have earned Quaeryt a promotion to commander, as well as an assignment to convince the Pharsi High Council in the nation of Khel to submit to Lord Bhayar's rule. If he succeeds, it will be a major step toward unifying the entire continent of Solidar under one rule. Joined by his pregnant wife Vaelora, who is also Bhayar's sister, Quaeryt leads an army, as well as a handful of imagers deeper into the hostile lands once ruled by the tyrannical Rex Kharst.Quaeryt faces stiff-necked High Holders, attacks by land and sea, including airborne fire launched by hostile imagers — and a mysterious order of powerful women who seem to recognize the great destiny that awaits Quareyt and Vaelora.
author: L.E. Modesitt Jr.
